title.rendered: The new BODHI + Emma Lewisham Facial you HAVE TO experience!

content.rendered:
BODHI HAS PARTNERED WITH ‘PLANET POSITIVE’ EMMA LEWISHAM SKINCARE TO CREATE AN EXTRAORDINARY BRIGHTENING FACIAL FOR ULTIMATE SKIN RADIANCE AND WELLBEING

Exciting news! In an exclusive collaboration, BODHI has partnered with internationally acclaimed Emma Lewisham skincare to create an exceptional illuminating facial treatment, the BODHI + EMMA LEWISHAM BRIGHTENING FACIAL.

You may have seen the beautiful Emma Lewisham products on shelf in our BODHI spas, and now we’re taking them into the treatment room. High-performance and radiance boosting, this unique holistic facial also delivers a deeper wellbeing benefits, in true BODHI style.

Emma Lewisham is luxurious, science-led natural skincare made in New Zealand. Biologically-active and planet-positive, the products are as beautiful as they are effective.

Launched on shelf at BODHI Spas late last year, the union sparked a collaboration to create the BODHI + EMMA LEWSHAM BRIGHTENING FACIAL. It the facial you have to experience!

Delivered mindfully, with love and intention, this science-led 100% natural facial focuses on brightening, firming, hydration and rejuvenation. Fortified with antioxidants, vitamins and peptides, layers of skin-beautifying formulations support skin health, target pigmentation and boost radiance.

A signature lymphatic drainage facial massage with rose quartz crystals stimulates circulation, to detoxify and oxygenate, and promotes absorption of the ultra-restorative products into the deeper layers of the skin.

The benefits of the BODHI + EMMA LEWSHAM BRIGHTENING FACIAL include:

  • Firming and ultra-restorative
  • Helps to reduce pigmentation and dark spots
  • Promotes plump, supple, hydrated skin
  • Boosts skin clarity and radiance
  • Supports skin health and detoxificatio

*“There is a beautiful synergy between BODHI Spa and Emma Lewisham that sparked this wonderful collaboration. BODHI Spa has a nurturing, holistic approach to wellness that really resonates with our values and they have completely embraced our passion for a circular beauty industry – actively helping to educate their guests about our refill programme, the Emma Lewisham Beauty Circle,” says Emma Lewisham, Founder.

What does the BODHI Spa + Emma Lewisham Brightening Facial involve?

*This science-led facial combines lymphatic drainage massage techniques with the rejuvenating properties of the natural Emma Lewisham skincare range. “Our potent rejuvenating formulations, paired with powerful detoxifying and oxygenating techniques such as lymphatic drainage massage, will leave your skin feeling deeply nourished and looking brighter, tighter and more luminous,” says Emma.

What results will the BODHI Spa + Emma Lewisham Brightening Facial deliver?

*An ‘all-in-one’ facial, this treatment is designed to provide complete skin nourishment while targeting a range of complexion concerns including brightness, elasticity, and hydration.

“It helps reduce pigmentation and dark spots, brightening and evening the complexion. It delivers deep and long-lasting hydration for plumper, firmer, and more supple skin. It also actively regenerates collagen at a cellular level, helping to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and boost overall skin health and detoxification,” explains Emma.

The facial was also formulated to provide a holistic well-being experience. “It’s designed to have benefits below the jawline – helping you to drop into the state of deep relaxation that’s essential for enabling our cells to regenerate themselves,” says Emma.

(*Spa + Clinic Magazine).

“This nurturing, holistic facial extends way beyond the jaw line for a deeper wellbeing experience in true BODHI style. It includes a grounding foot bath with Himalayan Salts, a guided self-care meditation with your therapist, and nurturing foot, arm and scalp massages, whilst the Emma Lewisham products work their magic,” Bodhi Founder, Tania Taylor explains.

 

The BODHI + EMMA LEWSHAM BRIGHTENING FACIAL is a luxurious 80 minutes, priced at $195, and launches at all of the BODHI spa locations in Perth today; BODHI Cottesloe, BODHI Highgate, BODHI Wembley and BODHI Westin Perth.

Read about this beautiful new facial in SPA + CLINIC Magazine.
